name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnology
summary: Represents an interface to a specific tag technology.

methods.name: close
methods.summary: Disable I/O operations to the tag and release resources.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Only one Tag Technology proxy can be connected to a Tag at a time.

methods.name: isConnected
methods.summary: Returns true if connect has completed, and close has not been called, and the tag is not known to be out of range.

methods.name: isValid
methods.summary: Return true if this tag technology was successfully obtained.

properties.name: tag
properties.summary: The tag technology that has been discovered.
properties.description: When a tag is discovered, a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag proxy is created and passed as a property to the onNdefDiscovered, onTagDiscovered, or onTechDiscovered callback (see ).
